description: The charred and nutty flavours of this dish combine well with the tender beef.
name: Nutty Beef Satay Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large non-stick pan to a medium heat and then add the peanut oil.
Add the ribeye and fry for 3 minutes on each side. Set aside.
Add the onion and garlic to the pan and fry for 4 minutes.
Add the rest of the ingredients, excluding the ribeye, to the pan and combine fully.
Bring the dish to the boil while stirring and then bring to a simmer for 15 minutes.
Dice the cooled ribeye into cubes.
Once the sauce has started to reduce and thicken, add the ribeye, stir for 1 minute, remove from the heat and serve with a choice of sides.
